description: Taste the healthiest soft drink on the Binance Smart Chain. DogeZero is here to revolutionize your trading experience with 0% BUY TAX. Delicious! A long term community-driven project! Just hold DogeZero to get rewards in $DOGE. The build-in buy-back and burn-mechanism makes DogeZero hyper-deflationary and increases the value of the token. A Limited NFT collections, the BNB-lottery and merchandise are just the start of our journey. We want everybody to be part with the coolest cryptodrink on earth
